title: One of the nicer looking "10's" you'll ever see **SOLD**
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: One of the nicer looking "10's" you'll ever see **SOLD**

posts.post_content: If this card is really a 10, most of mine are probably -30's...:eek:

If you are going to have paper loss on the front, that is a great place to have it...right on his white sleeve leading into the white border.  Nice card.

Brian

I never even noticed it or I wouldn't have sent it in for grade.  Did that little "why the hell did this get a 10?!" hissy after I got the grade, then noticed it.  Wished I'd sent it to PSA, would have received a 6 :D
